page.title: 07Wimborne Today by a teenager
page.content: A teenager (l8 years old) was asked some questions by a group of 8/9 year old children about living in the Wimborne area. She told us that she liked the area very much because it was near the country and the sea.She liked Wimborne because there were lots of interesting places to visit such as the Minster and the Priests House Museum. She said the town was not too large and the new houses being built blended in well with the old. She said the shopping facilities in Wimborne could be improved, but it wasn't far to travel to Poole or Bournemouth to get a better selection of shops. In her spare time she found plenty to do in the area - tennis, badminton and riding, and went to a Youth Club at the Methodist Church every Thursday evening.
